ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Sure, go ahead Code. But be careful, gestalts take good RPGing, so don t screw up. Also, Allied Forces still sounds almost identical to The Alliance, people

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

Sure, go ahead Code. But be careful, gestalts take good RPGing, so don't 
screw up. Also, Allied Forces still sounds almost identical to The Alliance, 
people could get the two confused pretty easily.

::Prowl::

Prowl's hands move to get a more confortable hold on Iron Raptor. An 
overpowering feeling goes through him as he feels Iron Raptor's lips pressing 
on his own and her stomach pressing against his as she breathes. He could 
tell that she was excited by the feel of her body in his arms.

He could almost feel the feelings flowing between the two bots when his 
internal computer's voice comes to life.

"Warning. Object 50 feet away and closing."

Prowl's eyes snap open at the comp's warning, seeing the tree that the two 
bots were heading at. He pulls up sharply, barely avoiding the tree and 
gaining more altitide.

Prowl turns back to Iron Raptor, his hands still holding her tightly. He 
grins.

"Maybe we should land..." He says before he kisses her again.
